pkgmetadata.longdescription: # memobjA library for defining objects in memory## installingpython 3.11+ only!`pip install memobj`## usage```pythonimport osfrom memobj import WindowsProcess, MemoryObjectfrom memobj.property import Signed4class PythonIntObject(MemoryObject): value: int = Signed4(24)process = WindowsProcess.from_id(os.getpid())# id(x) gives the address of the object in cpythonmy_int = PythonIntObject(address=id(1), process=process)# prints 1print(my_int.value)```## supportdiscord<https://discord.gg/7hBStdXkyR>
